channel.title: Javascript on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Portfolio

item.title: D-Bot
item.description: Introduction   Conceived during my university tenure for Software Engineering, D-Bot emerges as an Open-Source template tailored for contemporary Discord bots, harnessing the power of recently introduced slash commands. Organization   A team of 5 Software Engineers, complemented by an Assistant Project Manager and a Project Manager, collectively shaped the project’s organizational structure. Early Efforts   Taking on the mantle of lead backend developer among the Software Engineers, I spearheaded the creation of the bot’s initial commands and functionality.

item.title: Personal Portfolio 1.0
item.description: The original version of my personal portfolio is a static site developed using HTML, CSS and Javascript with no additional features. The site was developed both as a personal project and for my intro to web development class at community college. While the repository is archived, the latest version is still available on github pages, and can still be viewed below:
